name: Rolling Thing
description:
Infinite game that is still in Development, I would really appreciate some feedback on the game so I know how I'm going to continue devolping it

CONTROLS

  • UP ARROW FOR JUMP
  • RIGHT ARROW FOR RIGHT
  • LEFT ARROW FOR LEFT
  • HOLD UP ARROW TO STICK TO BOTTOM OF PLATFORM
  • COLLECT ALL COINS TO JUMP THROUGH THE PORTAL
